mapper.select: select sk.seckill_id,sk.user_phone,sk.create_time,sk.state, s.seckill_id as 'seckill.seckill_id', s.name as 'seckill.name', s.number as 'seckill.number', s.start_time as 'seckill.start_time', s.end_time as 'seckill.end_time', s.create_time as 'seckill.create_time' from success_kill sk inner join seckill s on sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id where sk.seckill_id = #{seckillId} and sk.user_phone = #{userPhone};
